scripts.lint:build: mkdir -p reports/ && jshint --reporter checkstyle src/*.js test/*.js > reports/jshint-checkstyle.xml
scripts.test:unit: mkdir -p reports/ && NODE_ENV=test multi='spec=- xunit=reports/mocha-xunit.xml' istanbul cover _mocha -- -R mocha-multi test/**.js && istanbul check-coverage
scripts.test: npm run depcheck && npm run depcheck:unused && npm run lint && npm run test:unit
scripts.buildci: npm run clean && npm install && npm run lint:build && npm run test
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm install && npm run lint:build && npm run edn.js && npm run test
